house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1979 has 3 bedroom(s), 1 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Pantry, Storage Space
